item.title: A new worldwide network of mobile social influencers has been introduced
item.description:
VOLTU, a new performance-based social influencer network focused on mobile acquisition, has been officially launched by mobile advertising technology pioneer Glispa Global Group. Building on Glispa’s successful history of creating custom influencer campaigns for clients like Square Enix and Youzu, VOLTU connects advertisers with global content creators to increase app installs, brand awareness, and user engagement. Influencer marketing is a proven method for engaging consumers because it utilizes genuine and relatable content made by consumers for consumers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-new-worldwide-network-of-mobile-social-influencers-has-been-introduced/
